function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vague definition of resilience","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding the concept and applying it to specific disciplines","Mitigation":"Provide clear and specific definitions of resilience for each discipline","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, practitioners, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions and professional organizations"},{"Description":"Overlap with existing concepts","Impact":"Confusion and misuse of the concept of resilience","Mitigation":"Clarify the distinction between resilience and related concepts","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, professionals, and educators","Owner":"Academic institutions and professional organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of specific examples","Impact":"Limited understanding of how resilience applies to different disciplines","Mitigation":"Provide detailed case studies and examples of resilience in ecology, materials science, psychology, economics, and engineering","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Students, researchers, and practitioners","Owner":"Educational institutions and professional organizations"}]}
